meaning: Blue is the color of the sky and sea.</br></br>It is often associated with depth and stability.</br></br>It symbolizes trust, loyalty, wisdom, confidence, intelligence, faith, truth, and heaven.</br></br>Blue is considered beneficial to the mind and body. It slows human metabolism and produces a calming effect.</br></br>Blue is strongly associated with tranquility and calmness.</br></br>In heraldry, blue is used to symbolize piety and sincerity.</br></br>You can use blue to promote products and services related to cleanliness (water purification filters, cleaning liquids), air and sky (airlines, airports, air conditioners), water and sea (sea voyages, mineral water).</br></br>Blue is linked to consciousness and intellect.</br></br>Blue is a masculine color; according to studies, it is highly accepted among males.</br></br>Dark blue is associated with depth, expertise, and stability; it is a preferred color for corporate America.</br></br>Avoid using blue when promoting food and cooking, because blue suppresses appetite.</br></br> When used together with warm colors like yellow or red, blue can create high-impact, vibrant designs; for example, blue-yellow-red is a perfect color scheme for a superhero.
